page.title: 07Religion
page.content: There is a church in the aea. Crayke Church is Anglican and shares the Priest in Charge with Stillngton, Brandsby and Yearsley. There are services held every Sudany and sometimes through week. The children fromthe local Church school have services in the church at main festival times such as Christmas, Easter, Ascencion Day etc. Catholic people have to travel to Easingwold for their nearest Church, Methodist Chappel Worshippers also have to travel to Easingwold. Apart from Church of England, Catholic and Chapel there appears to be no other practising religions.
